Properties.ProtectedString:
--Made by Stickmasterluke
sp=script.Parent
check=true
debris=game:GetService("Debris") cooldown=.2
function findsquirrel() for _,v in pairs(game.Workspace:GetChildren()) do if v.Name=="Squirrel" then local creatortag=v:FindFirstChild("creator") if creatortag and creatortag.Value==game.Players.LocalPlayer then sp.Handle.Transparency=1 return v end end end end
function onEquipped(mouse) equipped=true local plr=game.Players.LocalPlayer if mouse~=nil and plr~=nil then findsquirrel() mouse.Icon="rbxasset://textures\\GunCursor.png" mouse.Button1Down:connect(function() local chr=sp.Parent if chr and check then local t=chr:FindFirstChild("Torso") local h=chr:FindFirstChild("Humanoid") if t and h and h.Health>0 then check=false mouse.Icon="rbxasset://textures\\GunWaitCursor.png" local squirrel=findsquirrel() if squirrel==nil then local m=Instance.new("Model") m.Name="Squirrel" local p=sp.Handle:clone() p.Friction=.2 p.Name="Torso" p.Transparency=0 p.CanCollide=true p.CFrame=CFrame.new() local rd=Vector3.new((math.random()-.5)*15,(math.random()-.5)*5,(math.random()-.5)*15) p.Position=sp.Handle.Position+rd p.Velocity=rd p.Parent=m local he=Instance.new("Part") he.Name="Head" he.formFactor="Custom" he.Transparency=1 he.Size=Vector3.new(0,0,0) he.Parent=m local w=Instance.new("Weld") w.Name="Neck" w.Part0=p w.Part1=he w.Parent=p local h=Instance.new("Humanoid") h.MaxHealth=100 h.Health=100 h.WalkSpeed=18 h.Parent=m local orders=Instance.new("StringValue") orders.Name="Orders" orders.Value="Follow" orders.Parent=m local target=Instance.new("ObjectValue") target.Name="Target" target.Parent=m local targetpos=Instance.new("Vector3Value") targetpos.Name="TargetPos" targetpos.Parent=m local ct=Instance.new("ObjectValue") ct.Value=game.Players.LocalPlayer ct.Name="creator" ct.Parent=m local s=script.Script:clone() s.Parent=m s.Disabled=false debris:AddItem(m,5*60) m.Parent=game.Workspace p.Position=sp.Handle.Position+rd sp.Handle.Transparency=1 elseif mouse.Target~=nil then local th=mouse.Target.Parent:FindFirstChild("Humanoid") or mouse.Target.Parent.Parent:FindFirstChild("Humanoid") --print(th,th.Parent:FindFirstChild("Torso")) if th and th.Parent:FindFirstChild("Torso") then squirrel.Target.Value=th.Parent squirrel.Orders.Value="Attack" else squirrel.Target.Value=mouse.Target squirrel.TargetPos.Value=mouse.Hit.p squirrel.Orders.Value="MoveTo" end end wait(cooldown) mouse.Icon="rbxasset://textures\\GunCursor.png" check=true end end end) end end
function onUnequipped() equipped=false sp.Handle.Transparency=0 end
sp.Equipped:connect(onEquipped) sp.Unequipped:connect(onUnequipped)

--Made by Stickmasterluke
sp=script.Parent
damage=20
alive=true check=true nextjump=0 lastmove=0 cycle=0
meshes={114647745,114647773,114647802,114647836,114647881,114647920,114647944} standmesh=114636624 local link="http://www.roblox.com/asset/?id="
head=sp:WaitForChild("Head") hum=sp:WaitForChild("Humanoid") torso=sp:WaitForChild("Torso") mesh=torso:WaitForChild("Mesh") ct=sp:WaitForChild("creator") orders=sp:WaitForChild("Orders") targettag=sp:WaitForChild("Target") targetpostag=sp:WaitForChild("TargetPos")
torso.Touched:connect(function(hit) if hit and hit.Parent and hit.Parent.Name~=sp.Name and alive and check then local h=hit.Parent:FindFirstChild("Humanoid") if h~=nil then local plr=game.Players:GetPlayerFromCharacter(hit.Parent) if plr then if plr==ct.Value then return end end check=false h:TakeDamage(damage) wait(1) check=true end end end)
hum.Changed:connect(function(prop) if hum then if hum.Health<=0 then alive=false if torso then if mesh then mesh.VertexColor=Vector3.new(1,.1,.1) end hum:remove() if head then head:remove() end wait(5) end sp:remove() end else alive=false sp:remove() end end)
while alive do t1,t2=wait(.05) if orders.Value=="Follow" then if ct.Value then local chr=ct.Value.Character local tt=chr:FindFirstChild("Torso") if tt then hum.WalkSpeed=15 hum:MoveTo((tt.CFrame*CFrame.new(-3,0,-5)).p,tt) end end elseif orders.Value=="MoveTo" then hum.WalkSpeed=18 hum:MoveTo(targetpostag.Value,targettag.Value) lastmove=t2 orders.Value="Nothing" elseif orders.Value=="Attack" then if targettag.Value then local tt=targettag.Value:FindFirstChild("Torso") local th=targettag.Value:FindFirstChild("Humanoid") if tt then --and th and th.Health>0 then --this is too awesome local offset=Vector3.new((math.random()-.5)*5,(math.random()-.5)*5,(math.random()-.5)*5) hum.WalkSpeed=22 hum:MoveTo(tt.Position+offset,tt) else orders.Value="Follow" end end elseif orders.Value=="Nothing" then if t2-lastmove>=20 then orders.Value="Follow" end end if t2>nextjump then nextjump=t2+math.random(5,10) hum.Jump=true end if torso.Velocity.magnitude>2 then cycle=cycle+1 mesh.MeshId=link..tostring(meshes[(cycle%#meshes)+1]) else mesh.MeshId=link..tostring(standmesh) end end
